definition: used especially of persons, a person who is loyal to their allegiance (especially in times of revolt)
details:
adjective
- used especially of persons
= example: used especially of persons
= synonyms: stouthearted
- dependable
= example: dependable
= synonyms: stout
- having rugged physical strength
= synonyms: hardy, sturdy, stout
noun
- a person who is loyal to their allegiance (especially in times of revolt)
= synonyms: loyalist
